comments.author: Edgar Poce
comments.body: Change the Map implemention from java.util.HashMap to org.apache.commons.collections.SequencedHashMap

comments.author: Dominique Pfister
comments.body:
Thank you for the patch file submitted
- fixed as suggested
- added a test case that amongst others checks for order preservation

description:
The itemstates are ordered by the hash code.
It's an issue with PersistenceManagers that check referencial integrity (e.g. rdbms).
summary: ItemStates in the ChangeLog can not be retrieved in the sequence they were created/modified/deleted
